pt: {sc}decline{/sc} {sc}refuse{/sc} {sc}reject{/sc} {sc}repudiate{/sc} {sc}spurn{/sc} mean to turn away by not accepting, receiving, or considering. {sc}decline{/sc} often implies courteous refusal especially of offers or invitations.
{sc}refuse{/sc} suggests more positiveness or ungraciousness and often implies the denial of something asked for.
{sc}reject{/sc} implies a peremptory refusal by sending away or discarding.
{sc}repudiate{/sc} implies a casting off or disowning as untrue, unauthorized, or unworthy of acceptance.

pt.t: teenagers who {it}repudiate{/it} the values of their parents

pt: {sc}spurn{/sc} stresses contempt or disdain in rejection or repudiation.
